ModMetaData.name: Can't Mine Blind
ModMetaData.author: hawqeye19
ModMetaData.description:
Automatically shows the roof overlay when selecting the mine designator, and optionally designates thin roofs for removal.
Features: • Automatically toggles the roof overlay on when using the mine tool, and restores your setting afterward. • Optionally auto-designates thin (light green) roofs for removal when mining. ⚠️ DANGER: Roofs can still be dropped on colonists' heads if clearing unknown roof areas! This option is for convenience, not safety. • Settings configurable in the mod options menu. • Compatible with De-roof Mining mod, that mod will take over for roofing when both Can't Mine Blind and De-roof Mining are enabled.
Requires Harmony.
